column.name: password_never_expires
column.remarks: define if the password, should be check for validity period or not

column.name: reschedule_from_installment
column.remarks: Rescheduling will start from this installment

column.name: reschedule_from_date
column.remarks: Rescheduling will start from the installment with due date similar to this date.

column.name: recalculate_interest
column.remarks: If set to 1, interest will be recalculated starting from the reschedule period.

column.name: reschedule_reason_cv_id
column.remarks: ID of code value of reason for rescheduling

column.name: reschedule_reason_comment
column.remarks: Text provided in addition to the reason code value
